metadata.title: SIO Shore Station Data

creators.name: Scripps Institution of Oceanography (SIO), Marine Life Research Group

metadata.description:
Contains monthly and annual means of sea surface temperature, salinity and density data for the United States West Coast from 1916 to the present.  The data are collected by approximately 20 shore stations located along the West Coast, most in California.  Downloadable raw data are available via ftp site at ftp://ccsweb1.ucsd.edu/pub/shore/.

[ Reference: PICES Scientific Report No. 18 2001, Proceedings of the PICES/CoML/IPRC Workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific", http://www.pices.int/publications/scientific_reports/Report18/default.aspx. ]
